overview: Charles Livingston is an accomplished professional with over 20 years experience in building commercial application products, professional service organizations and technology focused companies. He has successful led numerous companies from concept to full maturity of their vision. Charles is currently at Exclusive Resorts, serving as a Senior Vice President. Previously he was a founding partner of SOFStone and PrincetonPearl Communications in the professional services industry and as CTO of IQDestination, an e-learning and corporate university business. Additionally, Charles held the positions of Director for Raymond James Consulting and Principal within the Internet Technologies Group of Oracle Corporation. He serves as a technical advisor within several venture firms, startups and philanthropic non-profit organizations.
